title: For Sale Original Devon Conversion 1964 RHD

posts.content:
For Sale 1964 RHD Microbus, original Devon Conversion
£32,500
Due to lack of use i am selling my bus.
Built in 1964 and imported to Devon this is an original Devon conversion.
Pictures below, this was rebuilt in 1991 which was when the current 1600 engine went in.
12 v conversion.
Stock height
Drum brakes all around
Bottom half blue was resprayed in 1997.
Top white resprayed 2008.
Since then I had the front resprayed after welding in a new bottom section behind the bumper and steps on both doors.
Recently mot’d this bus is ready to use and enjoy as it is.
It would benefit from some time spent tidying up the headliner, revarnish the wood etc but nothing that will stop you using this bus now and as your daily drive.
Always garaged and i would urge any buyer to ensure they can do the same (I rented a garage until i got mine sorted).
Price is £32,500. If you are interested and have any questions I can be contacted on 07906060552
Cheers, Lloyd.

For Sale again. This did not sell last year, has just been MOT'd again for the next 12 months and is back in the garage.
Was valued by the club 2 years ago at £28,500. Make me an offer if interested and/or contact me for any more info. Either here or my mobile 07906060552.
thanks
Lloyd

Valuations do tend to be over market price, not under.
My daughter took me to 'The Cups' the other day, saw your van and said 'that's not a factory colour', I was very proud!
Good luck with the sale
